jobs.label: Cena 01 — Paisagem ao amanhecer
jobs.prompt: A breathtaking mountain landscape at dawn, mist rolling through valleys, first rays of sunlight painting the peaks in gold and pink, timelapse-style movement, cinematic wide shot.

jobs.label: Cena 02 — Extensão da paisagem
jobs.prompt: The sun rises fully above the mountain range, birds fly across the frame, the mist slowly dissipates revealing a lush green valley below.

jobs.label: Cena 03 — Personagem aparece no horizonte
jobs.prompt: A lone hiker silhouetted against the sunrise sky, walking on a mountain ridge trail, dramatic backlit composition, epic cinematic feel.

jobs.label: Cena 04 — Transição: zoom no rosto do personagem
jobs.prompt: [ZOOM_IN_CUT] Close-up of the hiker's determined face, sweat on their brow, eyes focused on the summit ahead, natural lighting.

jobs.label: Cena 05 — Acampamento: personagem descansa
jobs.prompt: The hiker sets up camp on a flat rocky ledge, unpacking a tent, warm late-afternoon light, mountains in the background, peaceful atmosphere.

jobs.label: Cena 06 — Extensão: fogueira à noite
jobs.prompt: A campfire crackling under a stunning starry night sky, the hiker sits beside the fire, embers floating upward, Milky Way visible overhead.

jobs.label: Cena 07 — Transição: panorâmica para o vale
jobs.prompt: [PAN_RIGHT_CUT] The camera pans from the campfire to reveal a vast illuminated valley town far below, twinkling lights in the darkness.

jobs.label: Cena 08 — Cume: chegada ao topo
jobs.prompt: The triumphant hiker reaches the mountain summit, arms raised in victory, 360-degree panoramic view of mountains and clouds below, golden hour, emotional moment.

jobs.label: Cena 09 — Extensão: contemplação no cume
jobs.prompt: The hiker sits on the summit boulder, gazing at the horizon as clouds drift by below, serene and reflective, wind gently moving their hair.

jobs.label: Cena 10 — Encerramento: narração do personagem
jobs.prompt: A hiker speaking to camera with the mountain summit visible behind them, warm smile, reflective tone, natural wind sound.

jobs.label: C01-A · Corredor — Estabelecimento
jobs.prompt: A modern school hallway on the first day of school. Bright LED lights reflect off polished floors. Digital schedule screens line the walls. One student stands studying an interactive map on her tablet while another walks confidently toward her. They almost collide. No words spoken — just a startled look and a quick sidestep. Anime-inspired soft shading, wide establishing shot, warm ambient light.

jobs.label: C01-B · Valen — 'Foi mal.'
jobs.prompt: A teenage girl, composed but slightly embarrassed, speaking a brief apology, direct gaze, school hallway background. Close-up shot.

jobs.label: C01-C · Lumi — 'Tudo bem… eu que estava parada no meio.'
jobs.prompt: A teenage girl with a gentle, relieved expression, speaking softly, slightly flustered but calm. Close-up shot, school hallway background.

jobs.label: C01-D · Valen — 'Primeiro dia?'
jobs.prompt: A teenage girl asking a curious, slightly amused question, direct gaze, subtle confident smirk. Close-up shot.

jobs.label: C01-E · Lumi — 'Dá pra perceber, né?'
jobs.prompt: A teenage girl responding with a shy, self-aware smile, slightly embarrassed but finding some humor in the situation. Close-up shot.

jobs.label: C01-F · Corredor — Plano de saída, olhar que fica
jobs.prompt: Two girls walking in opposite directions down a modern school hallway. Each glances back briefly before disappearing into the crowd. A quiet moment of curiosity and recognition. No words spoken between them — only a lingering look. Medium shot, soft warm light.

jobs.label: C02-A · Sala — Lumi hesita, senta ao lado de Valen
jobs.prompt: A modern digital classroom, most seats already taken. A girl pauses at the door scanning the room, then sits next to a student near the back who does not look up. No words spoken — two strangers sharing space in silence. Soft blue ambient glow from screens. Medium wide shot.

jobs.label: C02-B · Lumi — 'Você já entendeu essa parte?'
jobs.prompt: A student leaning slightly toward the person beside her, whispering, curious and cautious expression, blue classroom lighting. Close-up.

jobs.label: C02-C · Valen — 'Quase. Acho que é mais simples do que parece.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding thoughtfully, arms slightly crossed, measured tone, not quite opening up yet. Close-up, classroom background.

jobs.label: C02-D · Lumi — 'Ou mais complicado.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding with dry subtle humor, slight raise of an eyebrow, almost smiling.

jobs.label: C02-E · Valen — 'Espero que não.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding quietly, a flicker of vulnerability behind the composed expression, looking back at her screen.

jobs.label: C02-F · Sala — Primeiro silêncio cúmplice
jobs.prompt: Two students sitting side by side at a desk, both looking at their screens, subtly aware of each other. A quiet first connection. Blue digital glow, medium shot.

jobs.label: C03-A · Refeitório — Maya desenhando na fila
jobs.prompt: A modern school cafeteria with digital menu panels overhead. A girl stands in the lunch line completely absorbed in sketching on her tablet, oblivious to the movement around her. Warm overhead light. Medium shot.

jobs.label: C03-B · Lumi — 'Você desenhou isso agora?'
jobs.prompt: A girl leaning in, genuinely surprised and curious, eyes moving between the drawing and the artist. Warm cafeteria background.

jobs.label: C03-C · Maya — 'Sim… eu gosto de desenhar enquanto espero.'
jobs.prompt: A girl looking up from her drawing, slightly startled but gentle, holding her tablet close, soft voice.

jobs.label: C03-D · Valen — 'É um cachorro-robô?'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking from behind, deadpan expression, pretending not to be interested but clearly looking at the drawing. Dry curiosity.

jobs.label: C03-E · Maya — 'É. Ele parece abandonado… mas não devia estar.'
jobs.prompt: A girl speaking quietly, looking down at her drawing with a contemplative, gently melancholy expression. A genuine thought, not just small talk.

jobs.label: C03-F · Refeitório — Três juntos na fila, vínculo silencioso
jobs.prompt: Three students standing together in a cafeteria line, one showing the others a drawing on her tablet. An unexpected small connection. Warm overhead light, medium shot.

jobs.label: C04-A · Sala — Caio entra, analisa a sala, vê o lugar livre
jobs.prompt: A boy enters a busy digital classroom, pausing briefly at the entrance, scanning the room with quiet methodical eyes. He spots one available seat next to a small cluster of students. He walks toward it without hurry. Cool classroom lighting, medium shot.

jobs.label: C04-B · Caio — 'Está ocupado?'
jobs.prompt: A student asking calmly, polite and direct, neutral expression, slightly formal posture. No excess emotion.

jobs.label: C04-C · Maya — 'Não.'
jobs.prompt: A girl answering simply, brief and neutral, barely looking up from her tablet. One word, no fuss.

jobs.label: C04-D · Lumi — 'Você já mexeu nesse sistema antes?'
jobs.prompt: A student turning toward the newcomer with genuine curiosity, open and friendly expression, slightly eager.

jobs.label: C04-E · Caio — 'Um pouco… ele é mais intuitivo do que parece.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding thoughtfully, gesturing slightly toward a screen, matter-of-fact tone, naturally joining the conversation.

jobs.label: C04-F · Sala — Quatro mentes na mesma conversa
jobs.prompt: Four students around a shared workspace, each looking at screens, all engaged in the same conversation naturally. First moment as an accidental group. Cool blue classroom light, medium wide shot.

jobs.label: C05-A · Sala — Maya tenta escrever com o dedo, Valen observa
jobs.prompt: A student trying unsuccessfully to write on a digital tablet with her fingertip, frustrated and improvising. Another student nearby notices silently. Warm classroom light, close-medium shot.

jobs.label: C05-B · Maya — 'Acho que esqueci minha caneta…'
jobs.prompt: A student muttering to herself, slightly embarrassed, looking down at her tablet, voice trailing off.

jobs.label: C05-C · Valen — 'Pode usar essa.'
jobs.prompt: A student holding out a stylus pen, calm and direct, no big gesture, matter-of-fact kindness without making it a moment.

jobs.label: C05-D · Maya — 'Sério?'
jobs.prompt: A student looking up genuinely surprised, eyes warm, touched more than she expected by the small gesture.

jobs.label: C05-E · Valen — 'Depois você me devolve.'
jobs.prompt: A student saying this with a slight smirk, already looking back at her own screen, deflecting the warmth but clearly meaning it kindly.

jobs.label: C05-F · Sala — Maya escreve, Valen olha de volta discretamente
jobs.prompt: Two students at a desk. One writes with a borrowed stylus, focused. The other glances at her briefly then returns to her own screen. A quiet new bond. Warm classroom light, medium shot.

jobs.label: C06-A · Sala — Professor erra, silêncio estranho na sala
jobs.prompt: A classroom scene. A teacher at the front mispronounces a complex technical term, creating an awkward pause. Students exchange glances. Wide shot from behind the four students, their reactions visible. Classroom lighting.

jobs.label: C06-B · Lumi — segurando o riso
jobs.prompt: A girl pressing her hand over her mouth, eyes bright with suppressed laughter, shoulders shaking slightly. She is fighting it and losing. Close-up, soft classroom background.

jobs.label: C06-C · Caio — 'Você ouviu isso também, né?'
jobs.prompt: A student leaning in quietly, trying to keep a straight face, eyes slightly wide, whispering conspiratorially.

jobs.label: C06-D · Maya — 'Eu tentei não rir.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding in a hushed voice, already losing the battle with laughter, shoulders slightly raised, suppressed giggle.

jobs.label: C06-E · Valen — 'Falhou miseravelmente.'
jobs.prompt: A student delivering this with a deadpan face that slowly cracks into a genuine smile. Dry humor, warm eyes.

jobs.label: C06-F · Sala — Os quatro rindo juntos pela primeira vez
jobs.prompt: Four students in the back of a classroom sharing a quiet laugh, covering their mouths, leaning toward each other. A genuine shared moment. The silence between them is no longer strange. Warm classroom light, medium shot.

jobs.label: C07-A · Corredor — Os quatro caminham juntos sem combinar
jobs.prompt: Four students walking side by side in a school hallway after class, unhurried, no one walking ahead. A natural unspoken formation. Wide shot, warm corridor light, afternoon feel.

jobs.label: C07-B · Maya — 'Vocês também vão pra biblioteca?'
jobs.prompt: A student looking at the others while walking, slightly hopeful expression, open and inviting.

jobs.label: C07-C · Caio — 'Preciso terminar a atividade.'
jobs.prompt: A student answering directly, factual tone, still walking, slightly nods toward the direction ahead.

jobs.label: C07-D · Lumi — 'Eu queria ver os livros digitais novos.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding with quiet enthusiasm, eyes lighting up slightly, honest and unpretentious.

jobs.label: C07-E · Valen — 'Então vamos juntos.'
jobs.prompt: A student saying this simply, no drama, no special emphasis. Like it was already decided. Slight tilt of the head forward.

jobs.label: C07-F · Corredor — Quatro em linha, equilíbrio inconsciente
jobs.prompt: Four students walking side by side toward the library entrance, no one leading. Equal line, unhurried pace. A subtle visual balance. Warm hallway light, wide shot.

jobs.label: C08-A · Sala — Professora anuncia grupos, caos começa
jobs.prompt: A classroom erupts into movement as students scramble to form groups. The four students are already near each other, slightly apart from the chaos. They exchange quiet glances. Medium wide shot, classroom lighting.

jobs.label: C08-B · Valen — 'Já somos quatro.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking the obvious truth calmly. The word 'somos' carries quiet weight. First time she includes the others in a sentence. Slight lift of the eyebrow.

jobs.label: C08-C · Caio — 'Facilita bastante.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding practically, understated agreement, small satisfied nod. No excess.

jobs.label: C08-D · Maya — 'Melhor do que procurar pela sala inteira.'
jobs.prompt: A student smiling genuinely, glancing at the chaotic classroom around them. A warm, spontaneous reaction.

jobs.label: C08-E · Sala — Os quatro como grupo, plano fechado
jobs.prompt: Four students settled at a shared workspace, calm and together while the rest of the classroom scrambles. They belong here. Medium close shot, soft focus on background chaos.

jobs.label: C09-A · Marquise — Chuva começa, eles param
jobs.prompt: Four students stopped under a school entrance overhang as heavy rain begins. The city street outside glistens. Digital signs reflect in puddles. A comfortable, unhurried silence. Wide shot, cool blue-grey light.

jobs.label: C09-B · Maya — 'Eu gosto do som da chuva.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking softly, watching the rain fall outside, a quiet smile, peaceful and genuine.

jobs.label: C09-C · Caio — 'A previsão não falava nisso.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding factually, glancing at his phone then at the sky, calm and completely unbothered.

jobs.label: C09-D · Lumi — 'Às vezes a previsão erra.'
jobs.prompt: A student responding gently, eyes following reflections on the wet street, thoughtful and unhurried.

jobs.label: C09-E · Valen — 'Melhor esperar juntos.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking simply, looking straight ahead at the rain. A rare, quiet warmth behind the usual composure.

jobs.label: C09-F · Marquise — Silêncio confortável, ninguém quer ir
jobs.prompt: Four students standing shoulder to shoulder under a rain shelter, watching the rain. No one moves. City lights begin to glow in the wet evening. Cinematic medium shot, quiet mood.

jobs.label: C10-A · Portão — Chuva diminui, último momento do dia
jobs.prompt: School gate at dusk. The rain fades to a light drizzle. Four students walk toward the exit together, the school day finally ending. Warm street lights glowing softly. Wide shot, golden-hour tones.

jobs.label: C10-B · Lumi — 'Foi um dia legal.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking genuinely, soft and honest, looking at the others with warm, open eyes.

jobs.label: C10-C · Caio — 'Foi mesmo.'
jobs.prompt: A student agreeing simply, no extra words, sincere nod, looking ahead. Two words that mean it.

jobs.label: C10-D · Maya — 'Não foi tão assustador quanto eu achei que seria.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking with quiet relief and genuine surprise at herself, slight laugh in her voice, looking at her companions.

jobs.label: C10-E · Valen — 'A gente sobreviveu ao primeiro dia. Já é um começo.'
jobs.prompt: A student speaking with dry warmth, a real smile finally breaking through. The word 'a gente' belongs to all four of them now.

jobs.label: C10-F · Portão — Plano final, a pausa antes de ir
jobs.prompt: Four students at the school gate at dusk. No one rushes. A long quiet beat as the city glows behind them. Final wide cinematic shot, warm soft focus, golden light.

jobs.label: Cena 01 — Escola: A Mesa Vazia da Piva
jobs.audio_text: Era segunda-feira. A mesa favorita da Piva, junto à janela, estava vazia pela primeira vez.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style 2030 futuristic school courtyard at lunchtime, group of teenage friends at outdoor table looking around with concerned expressions, empty corner with garden nearby, warm golden afternoon light, holographic signs on school walls, detailed vibrant background
jobs.prompt: Wide establishing shot of a futuristic 2030 school courtyard at lunchtime. Students seated at outdoor tables with food trays. A familiar corner near a garden is unusually empty. Valen, Lumi, Maya and Caio sit together looking around expectantly, scanning the area. Warm afternoon sunlight, anime style, slow camera dolly forward, vibrant colors, gentle breeze through the trees.

jobs.label: Cena 02 — Maya: Close de Preocupação
jobs.audio_text: Algo estava errado. Maya sentia isso.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up portrait of teenage girl Maya Flores, worried and puzzled expression scanning surroundings, biting her lip slightly, soft warm afternoon school background blurred, detailed empathetic facial features, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Close-up shot of Maya Flores at the school table, scanning the area with a worried and puzzled expression, biting her lower lip. Her eyes move slowly across the courtyard. Soft afternoon light, anime style, subtle camera push-in to her face, emotional and empathetic close-up.

jobs.label: Cena 03 — Maya Fala: 'A Piva não veio hoje'
jobs.audio_text: Gente... vocês notaram que a Piva não veio hoje? Eu fiquei aqui esperando ela desde que a gente sentou, olhei pra todo lado e nada. Ela nunca faltou um único dia desde que a gente começou a estudar aqui. Nunca mesmo. Isso tá me preocupando.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up of teenage girl Maya speaking with worried expression, leaning forward at school table, hands gesturing, wide concerned eyes, blurred school outdoor cafeteria background, warm afternoon light, detailed emotional facial expression
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Maya Flores speaking with genuine worry to her friends at the school table, leaning forward with hands gesturing expressively. Her eyes are wide and concerned. Warm school courtyard background, soft natural light, camera slightly angled up toward her face, emotional and caring expression.

jobs.label: Cena 04 — Lumi Responde: 'Ela tem um relógio interno melhor que o meu'
jobs.audio_text: É verdade, Maya, eu também tava estranhando. A Piva aparece todo dia certinho, quase no mesmo horário. Tipo, ela tem um relógio interno melhor do que o meu! Ontem ela veio, antes de ontem também. Hoje não veio e isso realmente me preocupa bastante.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up portrait of teenage girl Lumi Byte with calm but concerned expression, nodding thoughtfully at school table, gesturing with hand while speaking, soft warm afternoon light, blurred school background, detailed empathetic features
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Lumi Byte nodding thoughtfully and speaking to her friends at the school table. Her expression is calm but clearly concerned, analytical yet empathetic. She gestures with her hand as she speaks, looking around briefly. Soft afternoon light, anime style, steady camera.

jobs.label: Cena 05 — Caio Analisa: 'Padrão completamente alterado'
jobs.audio_text: Padrão completamente alterado. Ela nunca faltou, nem nos dias de chuva, nem quando tinha obra barulhenta aqui do lado. Se ela não veio até agora, é porque alguma coisa diferente aconteceu. Capivaras são criaturas de hábito fortíssimo. O comportamento dela mudou por um motivo concreto.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up of teenage boy Caio Luz with calm analytical expression, arms crossed, focused strategic eyes, slightly leaning back at school table, blurred school outdoor background, warm afternoon light, detailed composed facial expression
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Caio Luz looking serious and thoughtful, arms crossed, speaking with measured calm confidence. He leans back slightly in his chair, eyes focused and analytical. School courtyard with afternoon light behind him. Anime style, steady camera, strategic expression.

jobs.label: Cena 06 — Valen Decide: 'Vamos atrás dela agora'
jobs.audio_text: Então tá decidido. A gente vai atrás dela agora, não dá pra ficar aqui esperando. O lago fica do lado da escola e é o lugar favorito dela, todo mundo sabe disso. Deixa a comida aqui, isso pode esperar. Levanta, vamos todos juntos!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up of teenage girl Valen standing up decisively from school table, fierce protective leadership expression, hands planted on table, commanding pose, school outdoor background, warm afternoon light, dynamic powerful energy, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Valen standing up from the table with fierce energy and decisive leadership, speaking to her friends with a determined protective expression. She plants her hands on the table as she rises. School courtyard background, warm light, anime style, low camera angle looking up at her commanding pose.

jobs.label: Cena 07 — Grupo Sai da Escola em Direção ao Lago
jobs.audio_text: Sem hesitar, os quatro deixaram tudo para trás e foram em direção ao lago.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style wide shot, group of four teenage friends walking purposefully through school gate toward forested lake path, determined concerned expressions, late afternoon golden light with long shadows, detailed school building and trees in background, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Wide shot of the group — Valen, Lumi, Maya, Caio — walking with purpose through the school gate toward a forested lake path. Late afternoon light casts long shadows behind them. Trees sway gently. Anime style, camera tracks alongside from slight front angle, urgent and determined pace.

jobs.label: Cena 08 — Caminho: Maya Fala do Vínculo com a Piva
jobs.audio_text: Sabe, a Piva é tipo... ela faz parte da nossa rotina de um jeito que a gente nem percebeu quando aconteceu. Toda vez que alguém tava passando mal ou com um dia ruim, ela aparecia do nada e ficava do lado. Ela sente quando a gente precisa. Ela é especial demais.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium shot, teenage girl Maya walking on tree-lined path toward lake, hugging herself with worried fond expression, speaking emotionally, dappled afternoon sunlight through leaves, warm earthy forest path colors, emotional atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Maya walking among her friends along a tree-lined path toward the lake, speaking emotionally as she walks. She hugs herself slightly, visibly worried but reminiscing fondly. Dappled sunlight through trees, anime style, camera walks alongside her, gentle fluid movement.

jobs.label: Cena 09 — Caminho: Lumi Tranquiliza Maya
jobs.audio_text: Com certeza ela tá bem, Maya. Capivaras são animais muito tranquilos e muito espertos. A Piva conhece esse lago melhor do que qualquer um de nós. Talvez ela só precisava de um dia diferente por algum motivo que a gente ainda não sabe. Mas a gente vai descobrir, tô certa disso.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium close-up, teenage girl Lumi walking on tree-lined path, turning toward friend with warm reassuring smile, hand touching friend's shoulder, gentle understanding eyes, dappled forest sunlight, soft warm colors, supportive caring atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Medium close-up of Lumi walking alongside on the path, turning toward Maya with a warm reassuring smile, speaking gently and confidently. Her eyes are soft and understanding, one hand lightly touching Maya's shoulder as they walk. Dappled sunlight through trees, anime style, walking camera motion.

jobs.label: Cena 10 — Caminho: Caio Planeja a Busca
jobs.audio_text: O lago fica a uns duzentos metros daqui. Capivaras geralmente ficam na beira da água ou embaixo de vegetação densa perto do lago. Se a gente se dividir em dois grupos e varrer a margem pelos dois lados, a chance de encontrar ela muito mais rápido é alta. Precisamos ser sistemáticos.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium shot from behind, teenage boy Caio walking ahead on forest path, pointing toward distant lake through trees, afternoon sunlight glinting on water, strategic focused posture, detailed forest environment, determined atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Caio walking slightly ahead of the group, scanning the environment analytically, pointing toward the lake visible in the distance through trees. His expression is focused and strategic, formulating a plan as he speaks. Afternoon light glinting off distant water. Anime style, camera dollies forward behind him.

jobs.label: Cena 11 — Chegando ao Lago: Panorâmica Épica
jobs.audio_text: O lago se abria diante deles, vasto e quieto. Em algum lugar entre as pedras e a vegetação, a Piva esperava.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style wide cinematic shot, four teenage friends arriving at beautiful shimmering lake shore, golden afternoon light on water, lush trees and reeds surrounding the lake, friends looking around with determined awe, breathtaking natural landscape, vibrant warm colors
jobs.prompt: Wide cinematic shot of the group arriving at the edge of a beautiful shimmering lake. The water glows in afternoon light, surrounded by lush trees and tall reeds. The four friends stop at the bank, looking around in awe and determination. Camera slowly pans across the stunning lake landscape. Anime style, breathtaking golden hour environment.

jobs.label: Cena 12 — Valen Divide o Grupo
jobs.audio_text: Ok, vamos fazer assim: eu e o Caio vamos pela margem esquerda, do lado das pedras grandes lá no fundo. Maya, você vai com a Lumi pela direita, perto dos juncos altos. A gente se encontra do outro lado do lago. Qualquer coisa que encontrar, grita ou manda mensagem. Vamos com cuidado pra não assustar ela!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium shot, teenage girl Valen at lake shore giving directions, pointing left and right with leadership energy, determined expression, beautiful lake and reeds in background, golden afternoon light, dynamic confident posture, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Valen standing confidently at the lake shore, facing her friends and gesturing left and right along the shore as she divides the group into teams. Her leadership is natural and energetic. Lake and reeds behind her, golden light, anime style, dynamic confident pose.

jobs.label: Cena 13 — Maya Chama: 'Piva! Cadê você?'
jobs.audio_text: Piva! Piiiiva! Cadê você, menina? A gente tá aqui, pode aparecer! Olha, até esquecemos a sua comida favorita na escola de tanto que estávamos preocupados, mas a gente volta buscar pra você, eu juro! Só aparece aqui pra gente saber que você tá bem!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium shot, teenage girl Maya moving carefully through tall lakeside reeds, hands cupped around mouth calling out, worried hopeful expression, afternoon light filtering through reeds, water reflections visible, emotional searching atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Maya carefully moving through tall reeds along the lake shore, calling out with her hands cupped around her mouth. She looks worried but hopeful, moving slowly through the vegetation. Afternoon light filters through reeds, water reflections shimmer. Anime style, emotional searching atmosphere.

jobs.label: Cena 14 — Lumi Para: 'Olha ali perto das pedras!'
jobs.audio_text: Maya... para. Fica quieta um segundo. Olha ali, perto das pedras grandes do outro lado. Tô vendo um movimento diferente. Parece... parece ela! Não se mexa rápido, não faz barulho, vamos devagar pra não assustar!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style close-up of teenage girl Lumi stopping suddenly, wide alert eyes, gently grabbing companion's arm, pointing carefully toward rocks across lake, expression shifting from worry to recognition, lake background with large rocks, warm afternoon light, tense atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Lumi stopping suddenly, eyes going wide and alert, spotting something across the lake near large rocks. She gently grabs her companion's arm, pointing carefully. Her expression transforms from worry to intense recognition. Lake background with rocks, warm afternoon light, anime style, tension building.

jobs.label: Cena 15 — Revelação: Piva com seus Filhotes
jobs.audio_text: E ali, entre as pedras grandes, estava a Piva. Não estava perdida. Estava sendo mãe.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style wide cinematic reveal, calm mother capybara resting on lake shore rocks surrounded by tiny adorable baby capybaras, some nursing, some playing, golden afternoon sunlight shimmering on water, lush green background, warm emotional scene, beautiful nature setting
jobs.prompt: Cinematic wide reveal shot — a calm adult capybara resting peacefully on sun-warmed rocks at the lake edge, surrounded by several tiny adorable baby capybaras. The mother nurses and grooms her young. Golden afternoon light shimmers on the water around them. Anime style, slow dramatic reveal pan, warm emotional lighting, beautiful nature scene.

jobs.label: Cena 16 — Maya Explode de Alegria: 'Ela teve filhotes!'
jobs.audio_text: Ela teve filhotes! Lumi, você tá vendo isso? Ela teve filhotes! É por isso que ela não foi à escola hoje, ela tava aqui no lago cuidando dos seus bebês! Olha quantos são! São tantos! Meu Deus... que coisa mais linda e mais especial do mundo inteiro!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style extreme close-up, teenage girl Maya with both hands covering mouth, eyes wide and filling with happy tears, overwhelmed joyful expression barely contained, warm golden light on face, deeply emotional moment, tears glistening, beautiful lighting
jobs.prompt: Extreme close-up of Maya's face with an overwhelmed joyful expression, both hands covering her mouth, eyes filling with tears of happiness. She whispers with pure amazement, barely able to contain herself. Warm golden light, anime style, deeply emotional close-up, tears glistening.

jobs.label: Cena 17 — Lumi Chama Valen e Caio
jobs.audio_text: Eu já tô mandando mensagem pro Caio e pra Valen agora! Eles precisam ver isso! Gente, encontramos a Piva! Ela tá nas pedras do lado leste com os filhotes! Venham rápido, mas em silêncio absoluto, tá? Não façam barulho nenhum!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style medium shot, teenage girl Lumi typing excitedly on holographic wrist device, huge grin while trying to stay quiet, lake and reeds background, warm golden light, contained excited energy, futuristic 2030 wrist interface glowing
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Lumi excitedly but quietly typing on her futuristic holographic wrist device, sending a message to the group. She looks up with a huge grin, containing her excitement so as not to scare the capybara. Lake and reeds behind her, warm golden light, anime style, excited restrained energy.

jobs.label: Cena 18 — Valen e Caio Correm Pelo Lago
jobs.audio_text: Rápido, Caio! Precisamos ver isso agora!
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style dynamic wide shot, teenage girl Valen and teenage boy Caio sprinting along beautiful lake shore, excited breathless expressions, slowing down as they approach, exchanging quick glance, golden afternoon lake reflections, dynamic motion blur, vibrant exciting energy
jobs.prompt: Dynamic wide shot of Valen and Caio sprinting along the lake shore toward the others, breathless and excited. As they get closer they slow down, remembering to be quiet, exchanging a quick glance. Beautiful lake scenery, golden hour light, anime style, dynamic camera tracking their run from the side, motion blur on their feet.

jobs.label: Cena 19 — Valen: 'Ela soube exatamente o que fazer'
jobs.audio_text: Caramba... olha só isso. Ela não veio porque ela tava sendo mãe. Ela veio ao mundo dar vida a uma família inteira hoje. Sabe, acho que a gente que devia aprender com ela. Ela não precisou de ninguém pra dizer o que fazer. Ela simplesmente soube o que era mais importante.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style emotional close-up, teenage girl Valen with rare genuinely soft and awed expression, tough exterior completely melted into wonder, wide eyes and gentle smile, capybara family softly visible in background bokeh, warm golden lake light, deeply moving moment
jobs.prompt: Close-up of Valen seeing the capybara family for the first time, her usual tough exterior completely melting away into genuine awe and rare tenderness. Her eyes go wide, a soft smile — rarely seen — spreads across her face. The capybara family is softly visible in the background bokeh. Anime style, emotional close-up, warm golden light.

jobs.label: Cena 20 — Final Épico: Todos Juntos no Por do Sol
jobs.audio_text: E foi assim que a Piva nos ensinou uma lição que nenhuma aula poderia dar. Que às vezes a vida chama a gente pra outras prioridades — e tudo bem. Que ser amado é ser lembrado mesmo quando você some por um dia. E que os laços que a gente cria, com pessoas, com animais, com o mundo ao redor, são exatamente o que torna cada dia especial e único.
jobs.image_prompt: Anime style epic wide cinematic final shot, group of teenage friends sitting together at lake shore watching capybara family at breathtaking golden sunset, blazing orange red pink sky reflected on shimmering water, baby capybaras playing near rocks, camera pulling back and up to reveal full magnificent panorama, dramatic cinematic lighting, triumphant heartwarming atmosphere, masterpiece illustration
jobs.prompt: Epic wide cinematic final shot at golden hour — the entire group of friends sitting silently together on the lake shore, watching the capybara family in peaceful harmony. The sun descends behind distant hills, casting breathtaking orange, red and pink reflections across the shimmering water. Baby capybaras splash and play near the rocks. Camera begins close then slowly pulls back and cranes upward revealing the full magnificent scene — friends, capybara family, glowing lake, blazing sky. Anime style, triumphant emotional soundtrack energy, dramatic cinematic lighting, inspiring heartwarming conclusion, unforgettable final frame.

jobs.label: Cena 01 — A Gaiola Vazia
jobs.audio_text: Maya entra no laboratório de manhã, vai direto até a gaiola e para de repente. Com voz assustada ela diz: Espera... espera, espera, espera. A gaiola está aberta. O Faísca sumiu! Alguém viu o Faísca?
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school laboratory interior, empty small animal cage with open door on lab bench, scattered wood shavings, bright LED overhead lighting, detailed scientific equipment background, dramatic close-up composition, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Close-up shot of an empty small animal cage in a futuristic 2030 school laboratory, bright LED lights, cage door slightly open, scattered wood shavings on lab bench. Camera slowly zooms in on the open cage door. Anime style, warm laboratory lighting, tense and mysterious atmosphere.

jobs.label: Cena 02 — Alerta Geral
jobs.audio_text: Lumi fala rapidamente enquanto mexe no tablet holográfico: Caio, o Faísca fugiu do laboratório. Maya está desesperada lá dentro. Precisamos organizar uma busca antes que algum professor veja a gaiola vazia e a gente entre em problema sério.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school hallway, teenage girl Lumi holding holographic tablet with concerned expression, another student listening attentively beside her, bright corridor LED lighting, digital displays on walls, vibrant detailed background
jobs.prompt: Medium shot, Lumi Byte, observant teenage girl, stands in the futuristic school hallway looking worried, holding a holographic tablet, speaking urgently to Caio who stands beside her listening. Camera holds steady with subtle rack focus between them. Anime style, 2030 school, morning blue-white lighting.

jobs.label: Cena 03 — Caio Analisa as Pistas
jobs.audio_text: Caio observa a trava da gaiola com atenção e diz em voz baixa: Interessante. A trava foi empurrada de dentro, não de fora. Ele não foi solto por alguém — ele mesmo aprendeu a abrir. E olha aqui... rastro de sementes de girassol indo em direção à porta. Ele foi embora faz pelo menos duas horas.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school laboratory, calm analytical teenage boy Caio crouching near empty animal cage with holographic scanner device, focused analytical expression, detailed lab equipment surrounding him, blue-white LED lighting, vibrant anime art
jobs.prompt: Medium close-up, Caio Luz, calm analytical teenage boy, crouches near the empty cage in the lab examining it carefully with a focused expression, using a small holographic scanner. Camera slowly circles around him. Anime style, 2030 school lab, cool LED lighting with warm accent glow.

jobs.label: Cena 04 — Plano de Busca
jobs.audio_text: Lumi projeta o mapa holográfico da escola e explica: Ok, vamos dividir. Caio, você monitora as câmeras do sistema INETUSX. Maya e Natui, cubram o corredor leste e a biblioteca. Pix-Z vai rastrear o cheiro pelo sensor olfativo. E eu verifico as saídas para garantir que ele não saiu do prédio.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school laboratory, group of teenage students gathered around a glowing holographic school map, one student pointing and assigning roles, others nodding with determined expressions, warm LED lighting, detailed anime background
jobs.prompt: Medium wide shot, group of students gathered in futuristic school lab around a holographic map of the school building, Lumi points at sections of the map assigning roles, others nod and listen attentively. Dynamic camera pan across the group. Anime style, 2030 futuristic school setting, warm morning light.

jobs.label: Cena 05 — Maya Procura na Biblioteca
jobs.audio_text: Maya se move devagar pelos corredores da biblioteca sussurrando: Faísca... Faísca, meu benzinho, você está aqui? Não precisa ter medo, eu não vou te machucar. Olha, eu trouxe suas sementes favoritas... vem cá, meu amor, vem.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school library with holographic bookshelves, teenage girl Maya tiptoeing carefully between shelves searching, gentle worried expression, soft warm ambient lighting, glowing digital book displays, detailed anime art, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Medium shot, Maya Flores, sensitive artistic teenage girl, tiptoes through a futuristic school library, checking behind digital bookshelves and under reading pods, calling softly for the mouse. Camera follows her movement through the shelves. Anime style, 2030 library with holographic books, soft warm lighting.

jobs.label: Cena 06 — Natui no Corredor
jobs.audio_text: Natui ilumina embaixo dos armários e fala com entusiasmo contido: Ó! Aqui embaixo tem uma trilhinha de sementinhas! Ele passou por aqui com certeza! E olha — parece que ele foi em direção às escadas. Que ratinho inteligente, cara. Ele está explorando a escola inteira!
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school corridor with smart lockers, teenage character Natui kneeling with small flashlight examining under lockers, alert and focused expression, bright white LED corridor light, digital notice boards on walls, vibrant anime art
jobs.prompt: Medium shot, Natui, teenage character, walks carefully along a bright 2030 school corridor, kneeling to check under a row of lockers with a small flashlight device, whispering and looking alert. Camera low angle tracking alongside. Anime style, LED corridor lighting, detailed futuristic environment.

jobs.label: Cena 07 — Pix-Z Rastreia
jobs.audio_text: Pix-Z avança pelo corredor emitindo bipes enquanto fala com voz robótica animada: Rastro olfativo confirmado. Identificação: Faísca, ratinho de laboratório, macho, três meses de idade. Direção de deslocamento: segundo andar, ala de ciências. Taxa de sucesso da missão: noventa e dois por cento. Sigam-me.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school corridor, small robot Pix-Z with glowing eyes and green sensor beams scanning the floor, data processing displays around its body, low angle perspective, bright LED ambient light blending with green sensor glow, detailed mecha anime art
jobs.prompt: Low angle medium shot, Pix-Z small robot with glowing sensor eyes, rolls slowly along the school corridor scanning the floor with green sensor beams, detecting the trail. Data displays light up around its body. Camera follows from behind at floor level. Anime style, 2030 school, LED lighting with green sensor glow.

jobs.label: Cena 08 — Quase Lá
jobs.audio_text: Caio sobe as escadas em silêncio e fala em voz baixa para o grupo: Pessoal, a câmera 14 captou um movimento na sala de ciências dois há vinte minutos. Ele está lá. Mas — e isso é importante — temos que ser silenciosos. Se assustarmos ele, pode se esconder e nunca mais acharemos.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school stairway with glass railings and smart lighting, group of teenage students following a small robot up the stairs, mix of excited and tense expressions, natural light from large panoramic windows, detailed anime environment, vibrant colors
jobs.prompt: Medium wide shot, the whole group of students follows Pix-Z up a futuristic school stairway, tension and excitement on their faces, moving carefully and quietly. Camera tracks upward following their movement. Anime style, 2030 futuristic school architecture, natural light from large windows.

jobs.label: Cena 09 — A Descoberta
jobs.audio_text: Maya levanta o pano devagar e para completamente. Com a voz tremendo de emoção ela sussurra: Gente... gente, venham aqui. Venham ver isso. Mas — mas venham devagarzinho. Muito devagarzinho. Vocês não vão acreditar no que está aqui.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school science classroom, teenage girl Maya kneeling beside lab desk pulling back fabric cover, shocked and emotional expression on her face, dramatic warm light from underneath, other students leaning in with curiosity, vibrant anime art
jobs.prompt: Slow dramatic push-in shot, Maya kneels beside a large lab desk in a futuristic classroom and slowly pulls back a thick fabric cover revealing a hidden corner underneath. She freezes with eyes wide open in shock. Camera very slowly zooms into her face showing emotional reaction. Anime style, 2030 school lab, warm lighting, tense atmosphere.

jobs.label: Cena 10 — A Surpresa: Faísca Virou Pai!
jobs.audio_text: Maya levanta o ninho com delicadeza e a voz quebra de emoção: Ele não fugiu. Ele nunca fugiu. O Faísca construiu um ninho — olhem, ele usou pedaços de papel de filtro e algodão do laboratório. E ele teve filhotes! Seis filhotinhos! Nosso ratinho virou pai! Todos os alunos explodem em risadas e lágrimas de alegria ao mesmo tempo.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, 2030 futuristic school laboratory, soft warm golden light illuminating a cozy improvised nest under a lab desk with a small white mouse and six tiny newborn babies, teenage girl Maya holding the nest with tears of joy, group of students behind her with amazed happy expressions, magical warm lighting, emotional heartwarming scene, detailed vibrant anime art
jobs.prompt: Wide emotional reveal shot: the whole group of students leans in to see a small white mouse Faísca inside a cozy nest built from scraps of fabric and paper, surrounded by six tiny newborn baby mice nursing. Maya lifts the nest gently with tears of joy, the group reacts with open mouths and huge smiles. Camera starts with tight close-up on the mouse family then dramatically pulls back in a wide shot to show the students' emotional reactions. Anime style, 2030 school lab, warm golden magical lighting, heartwarming and triumphant atmosphere.

jobs.label: Cena 01 — Dia dos Pets: A Turma Chega com Seus Animais
jobs.audio_text: Narrador: Hoje é um dia muito especial na escola do futuro! Uma vez por mês, todos podem trazer seus pets para a aula. E cada pet usa uma coleira inteligente que garante que a diversão seja só alegria — sem confusão e sem perseguição. A turma está animadíssima!
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom with holographic screens and adaptive lighting, group of students entering with pets wearing glowing smart collars, vibrant warm welcoming atmosphere, detailed futuristic interior, wide establishing shot, colorful and energetic
jobs.prompt: Wide establishing shot of a futuristic 2030 classroom with ergonomic desks and holographic screens, students arriving and taking their seats with their pets wearing glowing smart collars, teacher smiling at the AI-integrated station at the front, excited and colorful atmosphere, adaptive lighting in warm tones, anime style, slow panoramic camera movement across the room

jobs.label: Cena 02 — Maya Apresenta Fifi, a Gatinha
jobs.audio_text: Maya: Gente, essa é a Fifi! Ela é a gata mais talentosa do mundo! Com a coleirinha inteligente dela, ela consegue projetar hologramas dos meus desenhos e dançar com eles no ar! Ela é literalmente arte em movimento! Podem chegar mais perto, ela é super tranquila!
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, expressive creative teenage girl Maya holding a cat named Fifi with glowing smart collar at the front of the class, holographic display panel behind her, students watching excitedly, warm amber lighting, medium shot, vibrant and detailed
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Maya standing proudly at the front of the futuristic classroom, gently holding Fifi the cat who wears a sleek glowing smart collar, Maya gesturing expressively with enthusiasm, classmates watching with wide eyes, holographic presentation panel glowing behind her, warm classroom lighting highlights Maya and Fifi, soft anime style shading, camera slightly tilted upward to frame the presentation

jobs.label: Cena 03 — Lumi Apresenta Natui, o Ratinho
jobs.audio_text: Lumi: Pessoal, eu sei que ele parece pequeno, mas o Natui é incrível! A coleirinha dele se conecta ao meu sistema de análise e juntos conseguimos resolver qualquer quebra-cabeça de lógica em segundos. Ele é meu parceiro de raciocínio! Maior que parece, pode acreditar.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, empathetic teenage girl Lumi carefully holding a tiny mouse with a miniature glowing smart collar, holographic data streams and analytical graphs floating around, students leaning forward with curiosity, soft blue and white tones, medium shot, warm and detailed
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Lumi Byte standing at the front of the futuristic classroom, cupping a tiny mouse named Natui in her hands who wears a miniature glowing smart collar, Lumi speaking with calm confidence, blue holographic data streams and small graphs appearing around her hands as she explains, classmates leaning forward fascinated, soft cool-toned classroom light, anime style

jobs.label: Cena 04 — Valen Apresenta Neve, o Cachorro Maremano
jobs.audio_text: Valen: Prestem atenção, porque isso aqui é nível outro! Esse é o Neve. Sim, ele é gigante. E sim, ele parece um leão branco. Mas o que a coleira dele faz é simplesmente impossível: ele projeta um campo de proteção holográfico em volta de qualquer pessoa que eu indicar. Ele é meu guarda-costas pessoal!
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, confident teenage girl Valen standing with crossed arms next to a massive fluffy white Maremma sheepdog with glowing smart collar, students looking wide-eyed and impressed, dramatic warm lighting from classroom panels, low angle shot, vibrant and dynamic
jobs.prompt: Wide medium shot of Valen standing confidently at the front of the futuristic classroom, arms crossed with a proud smirk, beside her Neve a large fluffy white Maremma sheepdog sitting regally with a glowing smart collar, the dog's thick white fur catching the warm classroom light, classmates visibly impressed and surprised by the dog's size, dramatic framing with low camera angle, anime style

jobs.label: Cena 05 — Caio Apresenta Roc, o Sapo
jobs.audio_text: Caio: Eu sei o que vocês estão pensando. Um sapo? Mas esperem. O Roc não é qualquer anfíbio. A coleira dele sincroniza com meu sistema de reconhecimento de padrões e ele consegue detectar mudanças no ambiente com até três horas de antecedência. É como ter um sensor biológico de campo ao vivo.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, calm analytical teenage boy Caio holding a colorful toad with tiny glowing smart collar, environmental holographic data charts floating beside him, students looking surprised and intrigued, soft cool lighting, medium shot, detailed futuristic school setting
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of Caio standing calm and methodical at the front of the futuristic classroom, holding Roc a colorful toad on his palm wearing a tiny glowing smart collar, Caio speaking analytically while holographic environmental data charts materialize beside him, classmates exchanging surprised glances, soft neutral classroom lighting, anime style, intellectual and composed atmosphere

jobs.label: Cena 06 — Rosinha e Ale em Destaque na Sala
jobs.audio_text: Narrador: E as surpresas não paravam! Rosinha, a porquinha que memorizava sequências de dança e as replicava com perfeição, arrancou risadas de todos. Já o Ale, o pastor-alemão, impressionou com seu escaneamento de presença em tempo real. Cada pet era único — exatamente como seu dono.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, a cute small pink pig and a noble German Shepherd both wearing glowing smart collars presented at the front of class, students cheering and clapping, colorful holographic stat displays on the walls, warm playful pink and gold lighting, wide shot
jobs.prompt: Wide medium shot inside the futuristic classroom, Rosinha a small pink pig with a glowing smart collar trotting neatly at the front beside Ale a German Shepherd sitting tall and alert also with a glowing smart collar, students cheering and laughing, holographic displays showing fun pet stats and abilities, classroom adaptive lighting shifting to playful pink and gold tones, anime style, joyful and lively atmosphere

jobs.label: Cena 07 — PIX-Z Analisa as Coleiras Inteligentes
jobs.audio_text: PIX-Z: Análise concluída em 0.003 segundos! Cada coleira emite frequências biométricas únicas sincronizadas com o perfil emocional e cognitivo do seu dono. Fascinante! Vocês e seus pets formam uma simbiose de evolução acelerada. Vocês são... equipes perfeitas.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 classroom, cute robot PIX-Z scanning pets wearing glowing smart collars with holographic analysis beams, biometric data streams and ability charts filling the displays, students watching with amusement and curiosity, vibrant cyan and blue tech colors, medium shot, detailed
jobs.prompt: Medium shot of PIX-Z the robot standing in the center of the futuristic classroom, optical sensors glowing with curiosity, scanning each pet with thin holographic analysis beams, biometric data streams flowing from each glowing smart collar to PIX-Z's display panels, classmates watching with amused smiles, classroom displays filling with colorful pet ability charts, anime style, vibrant cyan and blue tech colors

jobs.label: Cena 08 — Hora de Brincar: Todos para o Pátio!
jobs.audio_text: Valen: Muito bem, pessoal! Agora é hora de ir para o pátio e deixar os pets se divertirem de verdade! As coleiras garantem que vai ser só alegria! Todos para o pátio — vamos lá!
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic school transition from indoor classroom to colorful outdoor courtyard, students and pets with glowing smart collars excitedly rushing through open doors, bright bioluminescent grass visible outside, dynamic energetic composition, wide shot showing both interior and exterior, vibrant upbeat atmosphere
jobs.prompt: Dynamic tracking shot following the group of students and their pets rushing through the futuristic classroom doorway into the bright outdoor schoolyard, energetic movement with pets trotting alongside their owners, the camera follows from behind as the doors burst open to reveal the colorful bioluminescent courtyard, Valen leading the group with arms raised, upbeat and excited energy, anime style

jobs.label: Cena 09 — Pets Brincando no Pátio Futurista
jobs.audio_text: Narrador: No pátio futurista, as coleiras inteligentes garantiam harmonia total. Os pets corriam, pulavam e exploravam sem nenhuma confusão. Neve galopava pelo campo luminoso, Fifi perseguia borboletas holográficas, Natui explorava labirintos de luz e Ale dominava o circuito de agilidade. Era pura magia.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 school courtyard with bioluminescent grass and holographic play stations, multiple pets with glowing smart collars playing freely in open space, students cheering alongside animals, golden afternoon light casting warm glow, wide panoramic shot, vibrant magical and joyful colors
jobs.prompt: Wide panoramic shot of the futuristic school courtyard with bioluminescent synthetic grass and holographic play stations, multiple pets with glowing smart collars playing freely and safely in the open space, Neve running joyfully across the glowing field, Fifi chasing a holographic butterfly, Natui exploring a tiny illuminated maze, Ale racing through a colorful agility course, students laughing and cheering, warm golden afternoon light, anime style, magical and joyful atmosphere

jobs.label: Cena 10 — Encerramento: Um Dia Inesquecível
jobs.audio_text: Narrador: Ao final do dia, todos chegaram à mesma conclusão: os pets não eram apenas animais. Eram parceiros, aliados e parte essencial de quem cada um deles era. Naquele pátio futurista, humanos, robôs e animais descobriram que juntos, eram algo ainda mais incrível do que qualquer um imaginava.
jobs.image_prompt: anime style illustration, futuristic 2030 school courtyard at golden hour, all main characters together with their pets in a warm group embrace, glowing smart collars on each animal, soft golden light and floating holographic hearts, bioluminescent grass, wide emotional establishing shot, vibrant warm colors, heartwarming and hopeful
jobs.prompt: Wide emotional group shot in the futuristic school courtyard at golden hour, Valen, Lumi, Maya, Caio and PIX-Z gathered together in a semicircle each embracing their pet, warm golden sunlight casting long soft shadows across the bioluminescent grass, holographic hearts and sparkling stars floating gently in the air around the group, camera slowly pulling back to reveal the full futuristic school backdrop, anime style, deeply heartwarming and hopeful final composition
